agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Property Tax TIME & DATE: 2:45 PM or upon adjournment/recess Wednesday, April 17, 2019 PLACE: 2E.20 (Betty King Cmte. Rm.) CHAIR: Senator Paul Bettencourt 24 hour posting rule suspended To consider the following pending business: SB 1280 West Relating to the deferral or abatement of the collection of ad valorem taxes on an appreciating residence homestead. SB 2060 Menéndez Relating to the contents of a notice of appraised value sent to a property owner by the chief appraiser of an appraisal district. SB 2219 Bettencourt Relating to ballot propositions authorizing political subdivisions to issue bonds or other debt or to impose or change a tax. Public testimony was taken at a previous hearing, no additional public testimony will be taken at this hearing.
